documents.document: @MelanieEresman in all seriousness, I appreciate that you, unlike some right-wingers, don't leap to utter nastiness at the first opportunity
@MelanieEresman everyone needs to eat your food's food if they want to take a shit more than once a month (that's me lightening up)
@MelanieEresman scarf > openly proclaimed desire to eat other humans with whom you disagree
.@MelanieEresman that's funny, because I was asking myself if I was supposed to take a self-proclaimed wannabe vegan-eater seriously
@MelanieEresman tell that to the Chinese, who just cancelled 103 coal plants. The majority of the world/97% of scientists disagree with you.
.@MelanieEresman that's a bit rich coming from someone advocating that we continue to burn fossil fuels until we can't breathe anymore...
@MelanieEresman the platitudes of someone who is unwilling to exchange a little inconvenience for the greater good.
If you describe yourself as wanting to "eat a vegan," you are not to be taken seriously. https://t.co/Zae7jUcVP0
.@MelanieEresman the world will be underwater in a few decades, but as long as AB doesn't have a carbon tax, everything will be fine!
@Bill_Henwood sorry, I should have been more specific: https://t.co/JfCAy5DGJ4
@Bill_Henwood your assumptions are, again, wrong. Carbon pricing isn't a bad policy, nor is it broadly unpopular. https://t.co/uqpxxncBnA
@Bill_Henwood yes, the ultimatum that was irrelevant to the majority of Canadians bc they already live in jurisdictions that price carbon.
@Bill_Henwood that's all fine and good, but the premise of my original tweet is Scheer's promise of a repeal rings totally hollow.
@Bill_Henwood see, I can screenshot too! https://t.co/SzZldGMyiS
@Bill_Henwood and the feds mechanism won't kick in until 2018. AB's plan was in the works long before that. Again, know your stuff.
@Bill_Henwood those four provinces all adopted some form of carbon pricing before the feds got involved. Know your stuff.
@Bill_Henwood you're dead wrong. ON/QC/BC/AB alone constitute the majority of our population and weren't forced.
@andrewscheer except most Canadians will still be living in provincial jurisdictions that price carbon. This is smoke and mirrors.
Proud of @DrEricHoskins, who's spent his entire adult life supporting the vulnerable. This is the right thing to do. https://t.co/bGQBdWcx38

“Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?” #BellLetsTalk
@westernu I know -- we worked on it together for a whole year! Very excited about all the positive changes, esp. the WEC. #BellLetsTalk

This thread is for you guys! ^^ @teamdibrina @teamjanmohammad @VoteTeamTobi #BellLetsTalk
My advice: learn the intricacies. What's funded, for how much & why. Map the gaps. Know the frontline staff on a first-name basis. #WesternU
The incoming @WesternUSC exec has a responsibility to learn the MH system at #WesternU so they can help students navigate, expedite cases.
I trained up on MH first aid, alertness, and suicide intervention. If you want, you can too: https://t.co/uA22gPlwWe #BellLetsTalk
Want to learn to detect distress or how to intervene in a potential suicide? Check out these programs: https://t.co/uA22gPlwWe #BellLetsTalk
If a friend discloses their mental illness to you, you don't need to know what to say. You just need to listen and care. #BellLetsTalk
Met @clarahughes at #WesternU last year. Her story inspired me that day, and her leadership continues to inspire me today! #BellLetsTalk

People who say, "let's look at what she did to invite the violent online abuse. That's the real story" are repugnant and clueless.
*Neo-nazi punched*: "The left is disgusting! Violence is never the answer!" *Female leader harassed*: "Give ppl a break, they're just mad."
Top comment says "people when angry say things they should not." Funny. If you were the target of online violence, would you be so flippant?
Top comments on this are abhorrent, too. You don't get to tell someone to kill themselves because you're mad at them https://t.co/n0G7vjEtEc
Reaching out to someone struggling can change the course of their lives; I've seen it happen. So reach out, and help out. #BellLetsTalk
